Karol Szymanowski

Fantasia in C major, op. 14

1905 · Michałowski 13

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 12'

  • 1. Grave
  • 2. Non troppo allegro, ma molto passionato e affettuoso
  • 3. Allegro molto, deciso, energico

Recommended editions

  • Complete Edition (PWM) · B 7 · PWM 9268 · Piano Works I · ed. Ewa Bukojemska / Władysław Kędra
  • PWM · PWM 9805 · ed. Ewa Bukojemska

1. Grave

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 4.5

2. Non troppo allegro, ma molto passionato e affettuoso

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 4.5

3. Allegro molto, deciso, energico

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 4.5
